title: Kale coleslaw
ingredients: ['1 bunch kale, shredded', '1/2 head green cabbage, shredded', '1/2 head red cabbage, shredded', '2 carrots, shredded', '1 small red onion, minced', '160ml olive oil', '80ml balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1 teaspoon maple syrup', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch freshly ground black pepper']
